name: Pilldrop Factory
description:
!This game is still under active development!A physics based plataform game. Where you play as a pill named Pilly trying to escape from a factory.

The objective is to reach the blue goal.

How to play ?
- Click and drag with your mouse to choose the direction that Pilly will go. 

Made by Pilldrop Team

  • - Marcello Menezes - Programming
  • - Jonny Willian - 3D modelling
  • - Hélder Vinícius (Me :D ) - Level design/ Texturing/Shading
  • - Caleb Canaã - Sound/Music
